__TOC__

Details of the meeting held on September 6th, 2006

== Agenda ==

* Revisit dual license policy? (<nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-doc/2006-August/006875.html|mailing list thread]]</nowiki>)
* Do we want to have the licenses cited in full in our books or can we reduce them to links? (<nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-doc/2006-August/006900.html|mailing list thread]]</nowiki>)
* Change in use of entities (see <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-doc/2006-August/006984.html|this thread]]</nowiki>).
* Documentation Freeze fast approaching: Where are we at? What should we focus on for a final push?
